div.ab:
وأتمّ نعمته عليك وصلت إلى جبارة كتبك مع علّان وبعثت بكتب
سألــته عن سلامتك وسلامة إخوتك فسر في اللّه واكترث
شر جار في الدّنيا يقولون لإبراهيم النّحّاس
وأخذ منــه رهن ويلك اخرج إليه وخذ حقّك منه
وألح إن تخرجوا مع بر مصر تكونوا
وقال لــه عبد الرّحمن أبو الحسن يبعث الدّين
ولكن أدّيته ألف لا غير يرقد فيه
وســلامتــه

wa ʾatamma niʿmata hu ʿalay ka waṣalat ʾilà ǧubāraẗa kutubu ka maʿa ʿallān:in wa baʿaṯtu bi kutub:in
*** saʾaltu hu ʿan salāmati ka wa salāmaẗi ʾiḫwati ka fa sir fī ăl lāhi wa ĭktariṯ
*** šarr:un ǧāra fī ăd dunyā yaqūlūna li ʾibrāhīma ăn naḥḥāsi
*** wa ʾaḫaḏa min hu rahn wayla ka ŭḫruǧ ʾilay hi wa ḫuḏ ḥaqqa ka min hu
*** wa ʾuliḥḥu ʾin taḫruǧū maʿa barri miṣra takūnū
*** wa qāla la hu ʿabdu ăr raḥmāni ʾabū ăl ḥasani yabʿaṯu ăd dayna
*** wa lākin ʾaddaytu hu ʾalf lā ġayr yarqudu fī hi
*** wa salāmat hu

... And may He fulfill His loving kindness] unto you. Your letters have been delivered to Ǧubāra by ʿAllān, and I sent letters
... I asked?] him about your safety and the safety of your brothers. Go on depending in Allah, and pay attention to
...] an evil moves in the world (= in the present time). They say to Ibrāhīm, the coppersmith
... and he got?] from him a security. Damn you. Go ahead to himn, and take your right from him.
...], and I insist if you go out along with the land of Miṣr, you will be
... and?] ʿAbdarraḥmān Abū al-Ḥasan, [said to him (?)] to send the debt
...] And I gave him on credit one thousand not more but he sleeps on it (meaning: he does not want to pay it).
...] and his safety?
